insert into member ( member_id, nationality, login_id, password, gender, birthdate, nickname, introduction, profile_img_url, language, phone, passport_no ) values (
'K_'||seq_member_korean.NEXTVAL,

mapper.select: select member_id, password, is_admin from member where login_id=#{loginId} and deleted_at is null
select member_id from member where nickname=#{nickname} and deleted_at is null
mapper.update: update member set refresh_token = #{refreshToken} where member_id = #{memberId} and deleted_at is null
mapper.select: select member_id, refresh_token, is_admin, profile_img_url, introduction from member where member_id=#{memberId} and deleted_at is null
select member_id from member where phone=#{phone} and deleted_at is null
select member_id, nickname, manner, introduction, profile_img_url, gender, birthdate from member where member_id=#{memberId} and deleted_at is null
mapper.update:
update member set
nickname = #{nickname},
introduction = #{introduction}, profile_img_url = #{profileImgUrl} where member_id = #{memberId} and deleted_at is null
mapper.select: select m2.member_id as member_id, m2.profile_img_url as profile_img_url, m2.nickname as nickname, m2.gender as gender, min(c.CREATED_AT) as matching_date from member m inner join companion c on m.member_id = c.first_member_id or m.member_id = c.second_member_id inner join member m2 on (m.member_id = c.first_member_id and c.second_member_id = m2.member_id) or (m.member_id = c.second_member_id and c.first_member_id = m2.member_id) where m.member_id=#{memberId} group by m2.member_id, m2.profile_img_url, m2.nickname, m2.gender order by matching_date desc
